subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous Fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में लोकप्रदेश के एक पसंदीदा मंगल क्या है?
explanation_en: Meherazad Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur. It was built by Rao Jodha in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: महेराजद मंगल एक आदिता बसता जोड़ी द्वारा Rao Jodha 15वी वर्षों में बनाया गया है।
